articles.title: Google Bard could soon become your new AI life coach - Digital Trends
articles.description: A new report claims Google is building an AI life coach to help people with their problems. But it flies in the face of warnings from Google’s own AI experts.
articles.content: Generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools like ChatGPT have gotten a bad rep recently, but Google is apparently trying to serve up something more positive with its next project: an AI that can of… [+2759 chars]
